products.name: Samsung 65" QLED 4K TV
products.longDescription: Experience stunning picture quality with Quantum Dot technology, delivering over a billion shades of color. Features AI-powered 4K upscaling and smart TV capabilities.

reviews.comment: Great TV, but setup was a bit tricky

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro
products.shortDescription: Latest iPhone with Pro camera system
products.longDescription: The iPhone 15 Pro features a revolutionary camera system, powerful A17 Pro chip, and stunning Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion.

products.name: LG French Door Refrigerator
products.shortDescription: Smart French Door Refrigerator with Ice Maker
products.longDescription: 26 cu. ft. capacity with innovative Door-in-Door design for easy access to frequently used items. Features SmartThinQ technology for remote control and monitoring.

reviews.comment: Works great and looks nice in our kitchen

products.name: PlayStation 5
products.shortDescription: Next-gen gaming console with ultra-high-speed SSD
products.longDescription: Experience lightning-fast loading, deeper immersion with haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and stunning 4K graphics. Includes new DualSense controller.

products.name: MacBook Pro 16"
products.shortDescription: 16-inch Retina Display with Apple M2 Pro chip
products.longDescription: Designed for professionals, featuring a stunning 16-inch Retina display, M2 Pro chip for exceptional performance, up to 32GB unified memory, and all-day battery life.

reviews.comment: Perfect for creative work, handles everything I throw at it

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
products.longDescription: Industry-leading noise cancellation with 8 microphones and Auto NC Optimizer. Hi-Res Audio with LDAC, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable lightweight design.

reviews.comment: Best noise cancellation on the market

products.name: LG C3 55" OLED TV
products.shortDescription: 55" 4K OLED Smart TV with perfect blacks
products.longDescription: Self-lit OLED pixels create perfect blacks and infinite contrast. Features Î±9 Gen6 AI Processor 4K for enhanced picture and sound, plus all major streaming apps built-in.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
products.shortDescription: Premium Android smartphone with S Pen
products.longDescription: Featuring a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 200MP camera system, 12GB RAM, and the powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor. Includes built-in S Pen for notes and precision control.

reviews.comment: So many features, still discovering new ones

products.name: Dyson V12 Detect Slim
products.shortDescription: Cordless vacuum with laser dust detection
products.longDescription: Reveals invisible dust with a green laser light. Automatically optimizes suction and run time. LCD screen displays particle counts to show cleaning effectiveness.

reviews.comment: The laser actually helps you see dust you'd miss

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.longDescription: Experience 4K gaming at up to 120FPS, with the power of a custom Zen 2 processor and RDNA 2 graphics. Quick Resume lets you seamlessly switch between multiple games.

reviews.comment: Game Pass makes this a no-brainer
